name: Pong (itch) (milk9111)
description:
Pong!

A custom version featuring two game modes:

Normal
The classic match type. You play as the blue block and look to score 5 points against an artificial enemy that follows every move the ball makes.

Falling Blocks
The specialty game mode. Similar to Normal, but with the addition of randomly spawning yellow blocks that slowly descend across the screen.
